value.0:
Magistrate Okaris,

It has come to my attention that your child will soon participate in the final tests to graduate the Imperial Academy.  I know you must be quite proud to see your offspring reach such a prestigious achievement, and we of Zhantara extend our blessings to your family.

I would like to take this chance to ask what future you foresee for your child.  I know you and I have often discussed the possibility of further training amongst the ranks of the ShadowGuard, and I was curious as to whether you have given this proposal any further thought.

I have consulted Emperor Rakha regarding this matter, and He feels such a path would be most beneficial to all involved.  The decision lies with you, of course, but please do give this matter some thought.  

On other matters, I will be visiting your city of Ghaarak soon, and I am quite interested in investigating this gem your men recently uncovered.  Your recent letters have suggested that you are frightened of its power, and rightfully so.  If this thing is truly a relic of the Golden Age, its might is surely greater than we mortals of this age could fathom.  

As you know, Emperor Rakha has taken a great interest in any ancient relics of late, and He wishes to discover more of your finding.  Please prepare a full report for my coming, and we will discuss this matter further in person.

Your friend,

Overlord Vhorkas, High Commander of Zhantara
